description:
Unnecessary software uninstallation tool


v. 10.10 18/04/2025

- Improved trace detection algorithm for applications. Soft Organizer now
  accurately identifies traces and calculates the disk space occupied by Steam
  and games installed through it.
- Added dependency detection for related applications. If a user attempts to uninstall
  Steam without first removing games installed via the platform, a warning will be
  displayed. This ensures games do not become inoperable, as they may depend on Steam’s
  framework (uninstallation must follow a reverse order: games first, then Steam).
- Fixed duplicate applications in the list that occurred in some сases. For
  example, when AOMEI Partition Assistant was installed, a redundant entry named
  AOMEI Partition Assistant_is1, which served no purpose, would be added to the
  list.
- Fixed Bug: When uninstalling COMODO Internet Security Pro, the standard
  uninstaller did not work.
